slack.description: Slack integration for deal notifications, pipeline alerts, proposal review requests, and sales team coordination. Use for sending deal updates to sales channels, requesting proposal feedback, and coordinating with delivery teams on SOW details.

channels.sales-pipeline: Deal stage changes, win/loss announcements, pipeline health alerts
channels.proposals: Proposal review requests, RFP response coordination, approval workflows
channels.competitive-intel: Competitor updates, battle card changes, market intelligence

automations: Notify #sales-pipeline when a deal moves to Negotiation or Closed stage
Post proposal draft to #proposals for peer review before client submission
Share competitive intelligence updates to #competitive-intel when battle cards are refreshed

google-docs.description: Google Docs integration for collaborative proposal editing, RFP response drafting, and sales playbook maintenance. Use for creating and updating proposal documents, SOWs, and competitive battle cards in shared team drives.

document_types.proposals: Client proposals and statements of work created in shared Proposals folder
document_types.rfp_responses: Multi-section RFP responses with assigned owners per section
document_types.battle_cards: Competitive battle cards maintained in the Sales Enablement folder
document_types.playbooks: Sales process documentation and objection handling guides

workflows: Create proposal draft in Google Docs for collaborative editing with delivery team
Generate RFP compliance matrix as a shared spreadsheet for section assignment
Update competitive battle cards with latest intelligence findings

gmail.description: Gmail integration for outreach email drafting, follow-up sequences, proposal delivery, and client communication management. Use for composing personalized cold emails, scheduling follow-ups, and sending proposals to clients.

email_types.cold_outreach: Personalized introductory emails to qualified leads
email_types.proposal_delivery: Proposal and quote documents sent to client stakeholders
email_types.meeting_requests: Discovery call and demo scheduling emails

templates: Value-first introduction: Lead with client-specific research insight
Follow-up with case study: Reference a relevant success story
Breakup email: Respectful close with offer to reconnect later
Proposal transmittal: Cover letter with proposal highlights and next steps

google-calendar.description: Google Calendar integration for scheduling discovery calls, proposal presentations, follow-up meetings, and deal review cadences. Use for managing client meeting schedules and internal sales review rhythms.

event_types.discovery_calls: Initial client meetings to understand requirements and pain points
event_types.proposal_presentations: Scheduled walkthroughs of proposals with client stakeholders
event_types.deal_reviews: Internal pipeline review meetings and forecast sessions
event_types.follow_ups: Scheduled follow-up touchpoints with prospects in the pipeline

cadences: Weekly pipeline review: Monday 9 AM, review all active deals and next steps
Bi-weekly forecast: Every other Friday, update revenue projections
Monthly win/loss review: First Monday of the month, analyze closed deals
